name: Nmap - fast & service scans
description: Flexible network scanner for port discovery, service/version detection and scripting.

commands.name: Fast SYN all ports
commands.description: Fast SYN scan across all TCP ports and save output to file.

commands.name: Service/version + default scripts
commands.description: Service/version detection on common ports and run default NSE scripts; save output.

commands.name: UDP scan (top ports)
commands.description: UDP scan of the top 100 UDP ports using nmap's `--top-ports` heuristic; output saved for analysis. UDP scans are slower and may require retries/adjusted timing.

commands.name: NSE script-driven scan (default/safe/vuln)
commands.description: Run Nmap Service/version detection and execute selected NSE script categories (`default`, `safe`, and `vuln`) to look for common vulnerabilities and useful service info. Adjust script sets as needed.

commands.name: FTP-focused NSE scripts (FTP & TFTP checks)
commands.description: Run a set of FTP-related NSE scripts (anonymous access, bounce, vendor/backdoor checks and known vuln checks) plus tftp-enum; targets TCP 21 for FTP (and tftp-enum may check UDP 69). Useful for quickly identifying FTP/TFTP issues.
